languages.text: "Мои собратья тысячелетиями полагаются на видения провидцев, что указывают им путь средь звезд. Но за свою жизнь на Крударахе я слишком часто видела, как познание грядущего, изменчивого и капризного словно глубоководные течения, сплетает оковы на телах тех, кто страшится вступить в мутные воды. Потому я и стала Изгоем, отринув традиции Крудараха и покинув его пределы — чтобы самой искать свой Путь".

traits.locale_text: "Мои собратья тысячелетиями полагаются на видения провидцев, что указывают им путь средь звезд. Но за свою жизнь на Крударахе я слишком часто видела, как познание грядущего, изменчивого и капризного словно глубоководные течения, сплетает оковы на телах тех, кто страшится вступить в мутные воды. Потому я и стала Изгоем, отринув традиции Крудараха и покинув его пределы — чтобы самой искать свой Путь".

languages.text: "My kin have trusted in the visions of Farseers for millennia to show us our path amidst the stars. But throughout my life on Crudarach, I have too often seen knowledge of things to come — as changeable and capricious as deepwater currents — weave chains around the bodies of those who fear to enter murky waters. That is why I became an Outcast, renouncing the traditions of Crudarach and leaving its confines — to seek out my own Path."
languages.original_text: "Мои собратья тысячелетиями полагаются на видения провидцев, что указывают им путь средь звезд. Но за свою жизнь на Крударахе я слишком часто видела, как познание грядущего, изменчивого и капризного словно глубоководные течения, сплетает оковы на телах тех, кто страшится вступить в мутные воды. Потому я и стала Изгоем, отринув традиции Крудараха и покинув его пределы — чтобы самой искать свой Путь".

traits.locale_text: "My kin have trusted in the visions of farseers for millennia to show us our path through amidst the stars. But throughout my life on the Crudarach, I have too often seen knowledge of things to come — as changeable and capricious as deepwater currents — weave chains around the bodies of those of fear to enter murky waters. That is why I became an Outcast, renouncing the traditions of the Crudarach and leaving its confines — to seek out my own Path."

That is why I became an Outcast, renouncing the traditions of the Crudarach and leaving its confines — to seek out my own Path."

"My kin have trusted in the visions of Farseers for millennia to show us our path through amidst the stars. But throughout my life on the Crudarach, I have too often seen knowledge of things to come — as changeable and capricious as deepwater currents — weave chains around the bodies of those of fear to enter murky waters. That is why I became an Outcast, renouncing the traditions of the Crudarach and leaving its confines — to seek out my own Path."

languages.text: “几千年来，我的族人们一直相信先知眼中的幻景，相信它会在群星之中为我们指明道路。然而，我在克鲁达拉赫生活的那段时间里，我一次又一次地看到，关于未来的预言就像深潭中的水流一样多变、反复无常，会让那些惧怕进入阴暗水域的人背上枷锁。这就是我为什么选择成为了流浪者。我摒弃了克鲁达拉赫的传统，离开了它的领域，寻找我自己的道途。”
languages.original_text: "My kin have trusted in the visions of Farseers for millennia to show us our path through amidst the stars. But throughout my life on the Crudarach, I have too often seen knowledge of things to come — as changeable and capricious as deepwater currents — weave chains around the bodies of those of fear to enter murky waters. That is why I became an Outcast, renouncing the traditions of the Crudarach and leaving its confines — to seek out my own Path."

traits.locale_text: “几千年来，我的族人们一直相信先知眼中的幻景，相信它会在群星之中为我们指明道路。然而，我在克鲁达拉赫生活的那段时间里，我一次又一次地看到，关于未来的预言就像深潭中的水流一样多变、反复无常，会让那些惧怕进入阴暗水域的人背上枷锁。这就是我为什么选择成为了流浪者。我摒弃了克鲁达拉赫的传统，离开了它的领域，寻找我自己的道途。”

languages.text: 「同胞は先見司のビジョンを信じている。何百年にわたって、星々を進む道を示しているのだから。だが、クルダラで生活していくうちに、私はこれから起こることをあまりにも知りすぎてしまった――それは、深層を流れる海流のように、変えにくく移ろわないもの――暗い水に入るのを恐れる人々の身体に鎖を巻きつけていく。そのような理由で私は流浪者となり、クルダラの伝統を捨てて領域の外に出た――私自身の道を捜すために」
languages.original_text: "My kin have trusted in the visions of Farseers for millennia to show us our path through amidst the stars. But throughout my life on the Crudarach, I have too often seen knowledge of things to come — as changeable and capricious as deepwater currents — weave chains around the bodies of those of fear to enter murky waters. That is why I became an Outcast, renouncing the traditions of the Crudarach and leaving its confines — to seek out my own Path."

traits.locale_text: 「同胞は先見司のビジョンを信じている。何百年にわたって、星々を進む道を示しているのだから。だが、クルダラで生活していくうちに、私はこれから起こることをあまりにも知りすぎてしまった――それは、深層を流れる海流のように、変えにくく移ろわないもの――暗い水に入るのを恐れる人々の身体に鎖を巻きつけていく。そのような理由で私は流浪者となり、クルダラの伝統を捨てて領域の外に出た――私自身の道を捜すために」

languages.text: "Mein Volk vertraut seit Jahrhunderten auf die Visionen von Runenpropheten, auf dass sie uns den Pfad durch die Sterne weisen. Aber im Verlauf meines Lebens auf Crudarach habe ich zu oft gesehen, wie das Wissen um die Zukunft – austauschbar und unstet wie Strömungen in tiefem Wasser – Ketten um die Leiber jener schlingt, die Angst vor dunklem Wasser haben. Deshalb wurde ich eine Ausgestoßene, habe den Traditionen von Crudarach abgeschworen und seine Gefilde verlassen – um meinen eigenen Pfad zu finden."
languages.original_text: "My kin have trusted in the visions of Farseers for millennia to show us our path through amidst the stars. But throughout my life on the Crudarach, I have too often seen knowledge of things to come — as changeable and capricious as deepwater currents — weave chains around the bodies of those of fear to enter murky waters. That is why I became an Outcast, renouncing the traditions of the Crudarach and leaving its confines — to seek out my own Path."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Volk vertraut seit Jahrhunderten auf die Visionen von Runenpropheten, auf dass sie uns den Pfad durch die Sterne weisen. Aber im Verlauf meines Lebens auf Crudarach habe ich zu oft gesehen, wie das Wissen um die Zukunft – austauschbar und unstet wie Strömungen in tiefem Wasser – Ketten um die Leiber jener schlingt, die Angst vor dunklem Wasser haben. Deshalb wurde ich eine Ausgestoßene, habe den Traditionen von Crudarach abgeschworen und seine Gefilde verlassen – um meinen eigenen Pfad zu finden."

languages.text: « Depuis des millénaires, nous comptons sur les visions des Grands Prophètes pour nous montrer la voie parmi les étoiles. Mais l'avenir est aussi changeant et capricieux que les courants sous-marins, et au cours de ma vie sur Crudarach, je n'ai que trop souvent vu ces prédictions enchaîner ceux qui craignent de s'aventurer en eaux troubles. C'est ce qui m'a poussée à quitter mon monde et à renoncer à ses traditions pour devenir une Errante, dans le but de tracer ma propre voie. »
languages.original_text: "My kin have trusted in the visions of Farseers for millennia to show us our path through amidst the stars. But throughout my life on the Crudarach, I have too often seen knowledge of things to come — as changeable and capricious as deepwater currents — weave chains around the bodies of those of fear to enter murky waters. That is why I became an Outcast, renouncing the traditions of the Crudarach and leaving its confines — to seek out my own Path."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis des millénaires, nous comptons sur les visions des Grands Prophètes pour nous montrer la voie parmi les étoiles. Mais l'avenir est aussi changeant et capricieux que les courants sous-marins, et au cours de ma vie sur Crudarach, je n'ai que trop souvent vu ces prédictions enchaîner ceux qui craignent de s'aventurer en eaux troubles. C'est ce qui m'a poussée à quitter mon monde et à renoncer à ses traditions pour devenir une Errante, dans le but de tracer ma propre voie. »

languages.text: «Mi gente ha confiado en el saber de nuestros videntes durante milenios para guiarnos por las estrellas. Pero, a lo largo de mi vida en Crudarach, he visto demasiadas veces que los conocimientos del porvenir, tan volubles y caprichosos como las corrientes submarinas, encadenan a quienes temen sumergirse en aguas turbias. Por eso me convertí en proscrita: renuncié a las tradiciones y a la seguridad de Crudarach para buscar mi propia Senda».
languages.original_text: "My kin have trusted in the visions of Farseers for millennia to show us our path amidst the stars. But throughout my life on Crudarach, I have too often seen knowledge of things to come — as changeable and capricious as deepwater currents — weave chains around the bodies of those who fear to enter murky waters. That is why I became an Outcast, renouncing the traditions of Crudarach and leaving its confines — to seek out my own Path."

traits.locale_text: «Mi gente ha confiado en el saber de nuestros videntes durante milenios para guiarnos por las estrellas. Pero, a lo largo de mi vida en Crudarach, he visto demasiadas veces que los conocimientos del porvenir, tan volubles y caprichosos como las corrientes submarinas, encadenan a quienes temen sumergirse en aguas turbias. Por eso me convertí en proscrita: renuncié a las tradiciones y a la seguridad de Crudarach para buscar mi propia Senda».

languages.text: "Soydaşlarım yıldızlar konusunda onlara yol göstermeleri için binlerce yıldır Ötesezenler'in görülerine güvenir. Crudarach'taki hayatım boyunca gelecekte yaşanacak olanlara dair ben de sık sık bir şeyler görürdüm. Bunlar; derin sulardaki akıntılar kadar değişken ve tahmin edilemez olur, bulanık sulara girmekten korkanların bedenine zincirler sarmalarlardı. Bu yüzden Yurtsuz oldum ve Crudarach geleneklerini bir kenara bıraktım. O hücreden çıkmak ve kendi Yolumu bulmak istedim."
languages.original_text: "My kin have trusted in the visions of Farseers for millennia to show us our path amidst the stars. But throughout my life on Crudarach, I have too often seen knowledge of things to come — as changeable and capricious as deepwater currents — weave chains around the bodies of those who fear to enter murky waters. That is why I became an Outcast, renouncing the traditions of Crudarach and leaving its confines — to seek out my own Path."
